column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We went there on a late Saturday night while we were visiting Chicago. There were lots of ppl waiting for tables
column2: and we waited about 30 mins. We ordered a cheese pizza
column4: and a Malnati Salad. The pizzas were good
column5: and the Malnati salad was the best salad I have ever had. I miss it so much. I wish I could order a delivery to LA now!
